attributes.action: Make 23rd June EU referendum result null and void as voters has been misled.
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage has admitted today that the £350 million NHS pledge was a big mistake and this in mainstream news.
attributes.background: One of the key Brexit propaganda item was the weekly £350 million NHS pledge which now Nigel Farage admits was a big mistake. So what does this mean? Voters were misled; voters were lied to. A referendum whose foundation is based on a lie cannot be respected and has to be made null and void.

rejection.details: Apologies, the link we previously sent was incorrect. We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
